dcterms:description: The COSMOS survey is the largest available dataset for image simulation purposes, providing high-quality galaxy images obtained using the Hubble Space Telescope. It is used to build a training and validation set of galaxy images and extract condition vectors for deep generative modeling.
dcterms:title: COSMOS Dataset

dcterms:creator: Kyle W Willett
Chris J Lintott
Steven P Bamford
Karen L Masters
Brooke D Simmons
Kevin RV Casteels
Edward M Edmondson
Lucy F Fortson
dcterms:description: The GALAXY-ZOO dataset contains 61,000 galaxy images, each accompanied by a set of features derived from crowd-sourced classifications. It is used to demonstrate the capabilities of conditional adversarial objectives in generating galaxy images.
dcterms:title: GALAXY-ZOO Dataset
